question: I have had right upper quadrant pain X15 months.  My doctors all thought my gallbladder all test come back o.k.  I have been diagnosed wtih fibromyalgia in the process trying to find out what is wrong with me.  I have begun to think I am going crazy and so does my daughter.  I also have all the signs of having diabetes and those test are negative coulg the pain and other symptoms be related?  Are there other test I should ask the doctors to do?  Is there anyone else going through the same stuff?  Can you help me?
title: right upper quadrant pain
